member.summary: Executes the action on the UI thread asynchronously.

member.name: M:Caliburn.Micro.AndroidPlatformProvider.GetFirstNonGeneratedView(System.Object)
member.summary: Used to retrieve the root, non-framework-created view.
member.returns: The root element that was not created by the framework.
member.remarks: In certain instances the services create UI elements. For example, if you ask the window manager to show a UserControl as a dialog, it creates a window to host the UserControl in. The WindowManager marks that element as a framework-created element so that it can determine what it created vs. what was intended by the developer. Calling GetFirstNonGeneratedView allows the framework to discover what the original element was.

member.name: M:Caliburn.Micro.AndroidPlatformProvider.ExecuteOnFirstLoad(System.Object,System.Action{System.Object})
member.summary: Executes the handler the fist time the view is loaded.

member.name: M:Caliburn.Micro.AndroidPlatformProvider.ExecuteOnLayoutUpdated(System.Object,System.Action{System.Object})
member.summary: Executes the handler the next time the view's LayoutUpdated event fires.

member.summary: Get the close action for the specified view model.
member.returns: An to close the view model.

member.name: F:Caliburn.Micro.ViewModelLocator.TransformName
member.summary: Transforms a View type name into all of its possible ViewModel type names. Accepts a flag to include or exclude interface types.

member.name: F:Caliburn.Micro.ViewModelLocator.LocateTypeForViewType
member.summary: Determines the view model type based on the specified view type.
member.remarks: Pass the view type and receive a view model type. Pass true for the second parameter to search for interfaces.

member.name: F:Caliburn.Micro.ViewModelLocator.LocateForViewType
member.summary: Locates the view model for the specified view type.
member.remarks: Pass the view type as a parameter and receive a view model instance.

member.name: F:Caliburn.Micro.ViewModelLocator.LocateForView
member.summary: Locates the view model for the specified view instance.
member.remarks: Pass the view instance as a parameters and receive a view model instance.
